title: Toddler Puppy Bug Burst No Ad
creator: Deep Fried Labs

extendedInfo.description: Squish the bugs as they fly around and see a burst of colorful dots on the screen.   Includes a score counter to keep track of squished bugs.  You can also tap on the puppy to make it bark.Parents there are no ads during game play so toddlers are safe from accidentally clicking on unknown ads.  Support us by checking out our other products (click More Apps) when the game first start up.

reviews.title: No ads!
reviews.comment: No ads! My toddler can actually play this game!
reviews.author: Cornelius Grant
